H0.text: Which battle of 1897 brought Anglo-Egyptian control of Sudan. Atbara

H1.text: Which battle of 1897 brought Anglo-Egyptian control of Sudan. Abu Hamed

H2.text: Which battle of 1897 brought Anglo-Egyptian control of Sudan. Berber

H3.text: Which battle of 1897 brought Anglo-Egyptian control of Sudan. Omdur

A4.text: The Battle of Abu Hamed was a victory for the Anglo-Egyptian forces, securing the strategically vital town of Abu Hamed.

A5.text: The capture of Abu Hamed allowed for the completion of this railway across the forbidding Nubian Desert and made Kitchener's approach possible.
